name: Under the Wheats
description:
… So this was originally supposed to be a take on the Great Emu War of 1932, from the side of the Emus. However, because I’m a madman that only works in 3D AND by himself, I instead created an Emu herding/breeding sim/rts-thing with procedurally-generated Emu names and titles. It lends itself nicely to morally questionable role-playing/family management.

Left-Click: select units. Right-Click: move units, consume wheat. Scroll-Wheel: zoom in/out. WASD: move camera.

If you see blue heart going out of an Emu, then it’s ready to mate, just like in real life. Bring it close to another of the opposite gender to make a baby happen.
